src:
Maritime Bulletin Daily Nov 06 – 07
07 Nov 2019, 08:07 by Mikhail Voytenko
Accidents• Bulk carrier aground, West Mediterranean• Cruise ship CELEBRITY XPEDITION refloated after soft grounding• Ferry with more than 1000 passengers ran aground off Stockholm• Containers lost in South Atlantic• Containers fell overboard in Klaipeda• 2 vessels attacked in Gulf of Guinea?• Aground and Not Under Command vessels Worldwide Alerts (2 ships)
Details only for subscribers.Annual subscription $750. For annual subscription, contact vmd@odin.tcSubscribe if you want to receive accidents news ASAP and in full.
